response.overview: A briefcase with undisclosed contents – sought by Irish terrorists and the Russian mob – makes its way into criminals' hands. An Irish liaison assembles a squad of mercenaries, or 'ronin', and gives them the thorny task of recovering the case.
response.tagline: Anyone is an enemy for a price.
response.title: Ronin

titles.title: โรนิน 5 มหากาฬล่าพลิกนรก
